title: October Rain
description: The human race teeters on the brink of extinction in a solar system choking under the glare of a dying sun. An assassin for the Martian Interstellar Correction Agency, Steele has one more assignment to complete before a big payoff and the chance of a new life: a job that will reveal the true horrors of mankindâ€™s futile existence and threaten the very people who make his life worth living.As mankind draws its final breath, what would you do to save your family?
author: Dylan J. Morgan
